Description of incident: "Last month Harvard University uncovered "an intrusion" on its computer networks, the school disclosed late Wednesday."The discovery, which was made June 19, affects two IT systems that impact eight colleges and administrations, the school says. These include the Faculty of Arts and Sciences, Harvard Divinity School, Radcliffe Institute for Advanced Study, Central Administration, the Graduate School of Design, Harvard Graduate School of Education, Harvard John A. Paulson School of Engineering and Applied Sciences, or Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health."
